description:
If you’re the type that won’t let a little thing like a snowstorm get in the way of going for a walk, the you might have just found your next boot. Designed to keep you cozy when out and about in extremely cold weather, the Maple Leaf winter boot puts layers between you and the elements. A durable waterproof outer faces winter’s worst, while a soft plush fleece wicks moisture away from your feet and holds warm air close.

  • Full grain leather uppers are durable and classic
  • Waterproof construction and rubber lower boot seal out slush and keep road salt off the leather
  • PolyWool™ wool and polyester collar is thick and warm, creating a seal around your leg to keep the cold from creeping in
  • Removeable multi-layer inner boot system provides serious cold weather protection
  • B-Tek™ foam insulation is supportive, comfortable, and warm
  • B-Tek™ heat synthetic hollow-fibre insulation has a great warmth to weight ratio and impressive breathability
  • Hydromax™ moves moisture away from your feet
  • Aluminum membrane reflects heat back at you, like a thermal blanket
  • Combination of Arctic™ rubber and EVA rubber provide great traction and durability
name: Baffin Maple Leaf Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
